methods.name: get_cancel_button
methods.description:
Gets the 'Cancel' button.

for the 'Cancel' button.

returns.description: A string with the name of the current font, or %NULL if no

methods.name: get_font_name
methods.description:
Gets the currently-selected font name.

Note that this can be a different string than what you set with 
gtk_font_selection_dialog_set_font_name(), as the font selection widget
may normalize font names and thus return a string with a different 
structure. For example, "Helvetica Italic Bold 12" could be normalized 
to "Helvetica Bold Italic 12".  Use pango_font_description_equal()
if you want to compare two font descriptions.

font is selected. You must free this string with g_free().

methods.name: get_font_selection
methods.description: Retrieves the #GtkFontSelection widget embedded in the dialog.

methods.name: get_ok_button
methods.description:
Gets the 'OK' button.

for the 'OK' button.

returns.description: the text displayed in the preview area.

methods.name: get_preview_text
methods.description:
Gets the text displayed in the preview area.

This string is owned by the widget and should not be 
modified or freed
